data.Breakfast: 1 slice whole-wheat bread, toasted, 1 large egg, cooked in 1/4 tsp. olive oil or coat pan with a thin layer of cooking spray (1-second spray). Season with a pinch each of kosher salt and pepper,  2 Tbsp. salsa (Top toast with egg and salsa.), 1 medium banana
data.Lunch: 1 1/2 cups Black Bean & Mango Salad, 3/4 cup cubed cantaloupe
data.Dinner: 1 3/4 cup Zucchini Noodles with Avocado Pesto & Shrimp
data.Daily Totals: 1,215 calories, 130 g carbohydrates, 28 g fiber, 55 g protein, 61 g fat, 3,504 mg potassium, 1,599 mg sodium.
